title: Twisted Treeline Tournament

embed.description: A friendly tournament run on League of Legends 3v3 map, Twisted Treeline on the Oceanic server. Open to all players. Prizing: 1st - 3200 RP and Triumphant Ryze to every player 2nd - 2400 RP to every player 3rd - 1600 RP to every player 4th - 800 RP to every player This tournament will be held every month unless it clashes.

body: The only Twisted treeline tournament on the OCE server. Grab a couple of friends and sign up for fun and prizes
